SEARCH
Package Project

Class Post

java.lang.Object
Project.Post
All Implemented Interfaces:
SocialMediaElement
public class Post extends Object implements SocialMediaElement
The Post class represents a social media post, containing content, an author, and a list of comments. It provides methods to manage the post and its associated comments, and overrides key methods like display, toString, equals, and hashCode for proper functionality.
